attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Basically we have read about stories where british people move to places such as Sudan and are jailed for a number of days for letting a class call there class bear Mohammed ,small things such as this british people are being jailed . So therefore we have to abide by the laws and rules or there is no other option ,but its ok for foreigners to move to Britain and Demand things be changed to suit them , fair enough some mosques built to suit there religion , but demanding things be changed so they get there way is out of order in our opinion . They should abide by OUR rules as we abide by theres.

rejection.details: You must request some specific change or action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
